Any appointment to that staff, however, carries with it a set
of legal restrictions, by which Congress has regulated and fenced in the
conduct of federal officials. * * * * * In our view, section 105(a) of title 3 exempts appointments to the
White House Office from the bar in section 3110 of title 5. Section 3110
therefore would not prohibit the contemplated appointment. DANIEL L. KOFFSKY
Deputy Assistant Attorney General
Office of Legal Counsel 17
